issues.description: Line 35: .unwrap_or("unknown") in derive_speck_slug - consider documenting that fallback is defensive
Lines 539, 550, 563: Use of .expect() in test code is acceptable but could use more specific error messages

drift_notes: Fixes applied: generate_timestamp_utc() now returns Result, Path::to_str() calls use .ok_or_else() with proper error messages
